properties.title: Kronberg: Bob run, Zipline park and MÃ¤rliwelt
properties.abstract: Various attractions await guests on the Kronberg as well as in the valley: a bob run, the zipline park, a playground and a fairytale world for the little ones - and of course numerous hikes can be enjoyed.
properties.description:
The Kronberg bob run is open for full-speed fun from April to November. Directly next to the aerial cable-car valley station, you can take your place in one of the toboggans, which are securely attached to the rails, alone or as a pair, and enjoy a relaxing upwards journey. The speed at which you then travel curve by curve back into the valley is up to you: just use the brake lever. Thrills are guaranteed for everyone, young or old. 

And to ensure that time always flies by, alongside the fun of speeding down the mountainside, there is a Zipline Park with five different routes. For the little ones, there is the fairytale world with various adventure stations. If you want to travel even higher, you can take the aerial cable-car to the 1663m tall Kronberg.
photo_gallery_author: Christian Perret im Auftrag von Appenzellerland Tourismus AI
properties.name: Luftseilbahn Jakobsbad-Kronberg AG
